mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(book_title, book_author, book_date, book_page, book_publisher, book_cate, price_select, book_price, book_content, user_no, book_picture) VALUES(#{book_title }, #{book_author }, #{book_date }, #{book_page }, #{book_publisher }, #{book_cate }, #{price_select }, #{book_price }, #{book_content }, (SELECT user_no FROM user_info WHERE user_id=#{user_id }),#{book_picture })
